summary: Configuration container for the PatchTSMixer neural network, encapsulating all hyper‑parameters that define the model architecture, training behavior and output handling for time‑series tasks such as forecasting, classification or regression.
business_intent: Allow developers and data scientists to easily customize and instantiate a PatchTSMixer model by specifying dimensions, patching strategy, attention mechanisms, masking schemes, loss functions and output distributions, thereby streamlining the deployment of advanced time‑series forecasting solutions.
